children.Description:
Framework for dispatching various procedure on update application.
version checking callback framework with no UI.
children.Name: Fit

children.Description:
Notify users when a new version of your Android app is available, and prompt them with the Play Store link. A port of the iOS library of the same name.
focused feature set that mimicks the popular iOS library of the same name. Supports Play and Amazon.
children.Name: Siren

children.Description:
Easily notify a user with a simple alert, inform them of an optional update, and in dire situations block the user from accessing older versions of the application completely.
comprehensive features and a "companion" iOS solution.
children.Name: gandalf

children.Description:
A library that checks for your apps' updates on Google Play, GitHub, Amazon, F-Droid or your own server. API 9+ required.
comprehensive and feature rich library, including support for checks at Amazon and FDroid.
children.Name: AppUpdater

children.Description: Custom Android view with video player, loader and placeholder image
children.Name: VideoPlayView

children.Description:
An extensible media player for Android
ExoPlayer is an application level media player for Android, allow  playing audio and video both locally and over the Internet.
children.Name: ExoPlayer

children.Description:
Three material Dots Indicators for view pagers in Android !  
Three Material Dots Indicators styles for View Pagers.
children.Name: dotsindicator

children.Description:
SmartGattLib is a Java library that simplifies the work with Bluetooth SMART devices
Simplifies the work with Bluetooth SMART devices (a.k.a. Bluetooth Low Energy in Bluetooth 4.0).
children.Name: SmartGattLib
